name: Squishy Ninja
description:
This is a Platformer game with a difference. It is a platformer game designed for one player. It has three different level players can go through. Each level designed has its own set of obstacles for players to conquer. 

 • There are only 4 sets of rules to this 3 level game 

There is 3 levels the player has to complete  

• The player has 3 lives during this game 

•  The player must 

• overcome obstacles such as spikes to get to the flag 

• The levels get progressively difficult as the game goes on.
